name: Connection (Shoebby)
description:
Connections is a social game that drives strangers together, both literally and figuratively.

Connections is a VR game, tested and presented only using the Oculus Rift S headset. A non-VR version will be made someday.

Made By
Anna - Concepting, Character/Environmental/UI Design

Chantal - Concepting, Environmental Design, Post-Processing

Hedda - Concepting, Environmental/Prop Design

Pepijn - Concepting, Programming

Thomas - Concepting, Programming, UI Design

Vera - Concepting, Environmental Design
